whiz.net

Class HttpCookies

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ace
      • whiz.Whiz
        • whiz.net.HttpCookies

  • public class HttpCookies
extends Whiz
    Utility class for working with HTTP cookies.

      • isCookieHeader

        public static final boolean isCookieHeader(java.lang.String header)
        Determines if the specified header is a cookie header.
        Parameters:
        header -
        Returns:
        true if the specified header is a cookie header, false otherwise

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the resulting string

      • parseCookies

        public static java.util.List<java.net.HttpCookie> parseCookies(java.lang.String value)
        Parses the specified cookies string to a list of HTTP cookies objects instances. From documentation: Constructs cookies from set-cookie or set-cookie2 header string. RFC 2965 section 3.2.2 set-cookie2 syntax indicates that one header line may contain more than one cookie definitions, so this is a static utility method instead of another constructor.
        Parameters:
        value -
        Returns:
        the resulting list
